item.title: Item command [PI]

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && (c.playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
final int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
final int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch (final Exception e) {

		} // HERE?
	} // HERE?[/code]

item.title: Item command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sam81199 sam81199
item.description:
@sam81199 wrote:

in my server my item command doesn’t do what its sapost to do it says wrong usage but i set the command to work here is the code and also i cant change what right you have to be to use it any ideas :/?

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 1) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?
